title: Grade 9 - Technology and the Skilled Trades (2024)
subject: Technological Education

document.title: Grade 9 - Technology and the Skilled Trades (2024)

A1C88623CFB0433BAF7F1669607F5DD4.description: evaluate the transferable skills they are developing and analyze how these skills relate to current and emerging careers in technological fields and the skilled trades

C7C1BBD3FAAB4F8AB136514910C7C4F5.description: investigate and describe a variety of pathways leading to careers in technological fields and the skilled trades, including their structure and the educational and financial requirements for them

06440F171074451F9502653079F44FB7.description: research and identify programs, including in-school job skills programs and community-based programs, related to pathways and careers in technological fields and the skilled trades

7B675E00A9554D35AA83ABD34B73B64D.description: explore a variety of roles, responsibilities, and opportunities related to current and emerging careers in technological fields, including a variety of broad-based technology areas, and the skilled trades

FAB1DE67AE0D4509A06219F09432D6E7.description: Careers and Pathways in Technology and the Skilled Trades. Explore and describe careers in technological fields and the skilled trades, and pathways for entering them

EA5489A370694C46BDDBDF1F3B3F859A.description: evaluate how positive and negative impacts of various technologies can influence technological evolution, including emerging technologies

3A29E8D793C4459293DB26CDA8474F00.description: explain local and global impacts of various technological innovations on the environment and the economy, including the labour market

E1FA3DA113554465A3DBD25CEF48CA79.description: identify short-term and long-term impacts of various technological innovations on individuals and societies, including the impact on everyday life

1076A7C92199451198CF892DD9D3D464.description: Impacts of Technology. Analyze impacts of various technologies on individuals, society, the economy, and the environment

6BCF89DDA6FB4EC486484703BD1908A1.description: describe ways in which diverse communities, including First Nations, Métis, and Inuit, have applied their understandings, practices, beliefs, and experiences in their approach to technological problem solving

6E81BC73591B45E7937CDFEC4D0548E2.description: investigate and identify contributions to technological innovations made by Canadians, including women, and members of diverse groups and communities in Canada, including First Nations, Métis, and Inuit

1679C506936A4906A373FE20A1D5B869.description: analyze how the development and application of technologies are impacted by legal, ethical, social, economic, and environmental considerations

16765DE009F1441B962D9900DC4B7630.description: investigate and describe interrelationships between user needs and the development of various technological solutions

4E172FFC1A604D4D9FE09D8E89E5DE01.description: Fundamentals of Technological Development. Demonstrate an understanding of how various needs and underlying social, economic, and environmental factors drive the evolution of technology

6FA266F802284359B8D1E2F713DAC61C.description: demonstrate a safety mindset by making safety a priority at all times and by engaging in industry-specific safety procedures

3C878427DAA544CE854D4406B79FC832.description: follow proper procedures for the safe handling, storage, and disposal of materials and waste products

FA3E8E1D327C409AA95919395F598F36.description: follow practices that support physical and mental health and well-being

2256F5912B004EA393F09834FD624CCA.description: use tools and equipment safely, including using personal protective equipment and safety devices as appropriate

58AF65A0295749AC9CB3D2262054B1ED.description: identify hazards in their environment, and apply strategies to minimize risks

52B85D30CB734BA9B53C0047F76BA76D.description: describe relevant health and safety regulations for the classroom and workplace, including mandated roles and responsibilities

5F11287413834805BE7405DD04C54B58.description: Following Health and Safety Principles. Apply an understanding of health and safety practices and procedures when using materials, tools, and equipment

8B3BBD67233E4F6E95E0CB9B50322E6F.description: communicate project-related challenges, performance analyses, and proposals for refinements for a specific audience, using appropriate formats and terminology

72E886AE7BA3450F9321CFD9B5EA21A2.description: identify potential refinements to the design of products and/or services based on an analysis of data collected throughout the development process

9FF54520461545FFAED202B574C2BF76.description: analyze the performance of products and/or service delivery using appropriate criteria

8CA4A6240F114DA0BF6569D5909F6510.description: identify challenges they encounter in the process of developing their projects and apply critical thinking skills to address these challenges

68E841B26F4241678D8EA129CE343A3E.description: Analyzing and Refining. Evaluate and refine processes, products, and/or services

9E25DCD613C444CDA2B60C2462F2C356.description: select appropriate units of measure and tools to make accurate measurements using relevant measurement systems, such as the metric and imperial systems

1DA87409ABF940638039C2B6EFF4D96F.description: create products and/or deliver services, documenting their development process using appropriate industry terminology

51F0573FCC1642B98D04DC70FBCB73D0.description: use a variety of industry-related documents to guide the creation of products and/or the delivery of services as part of their projects

72225522824C4BB9B618D5BE9D3FE03D.description: select, use, and maintain tools and equipment appropriately as part of creating products and/or delivering services

BD0BD1D9CD944FB982FF8F8C198B0BAA.description: describe properties and characteristics, including sustainability, of materials, and justify the selection of the materials and other resources they are using in the creation of products and/or services

F08A763B02A34B61B4ADC8C9384BDE76.description: identify factors that could impact the development of their projects and apply appropriate strategies to increase the probability of a positive outcome

2FBE3974C434475A9581AEFD5BC446BE.description: use project management skills to develop a process to create a product and/or service

8B518297466D4CCFBA75EBEA79575A2F.description: Designing and Performing. Develop projects that involve creating products and/or services, using a variety of resources and techniques, and record the development of their projects

7CAFC2A5225440F48062D71EAF56193B.description: collect and synthesize information from a variety of sources, including people with diverse perspectives and from various communities, such as First Nations, Métis, and Inuit, to inform their projects

64C9E289F1284E98A7EBD86FF4A574A1.description: investigate and describe project management skills and approaches that are relevant to developing products and/or services, and identify skills they will use in their own projects

CF6C192CBCF3477184EB075EFDC88AE8.description: establish evaluation criteria for products and/or services being developed, including qualitative and/or quantitative measures, making connections to relevant fundamental technological concepts

CF94BD39D0F844E68E477687A21A7A4B.description: communicate design ideas for various purposes and audiences, using appropriate industry terminology

CC7C096ECBD84A4A9F6494770A942F4D.description: investigate and describe design considerations, including accessibility requirements, that are relevant to developing projects involving products and/or services for a specific user or community

CBA41CC3B306473B95BD9BB83B2135E3.description: apply an understanding of fundamental technological concepts, design considerations, and science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM) concepts as appropriate in developing projects involving the creation of products and/or services

0FA64E221C8C4D52BD8BE1EBB66E2C17.description: investigate and describe fundamental technological concepts, and explain how they are relevant to developing products and/or services in a variety of broad-based technology areas

B870F8DBCC99460394EC648B9F64834B.description: Initiating and Planning. Demonstrate an understanding of fundamental technological concepts and related skills by initiating and planning projects
